products.title: Oversized Baggy Fit Drop Shoulder T-Shirt
products.description: Introducing the Veirdo Oversized Baggy Fit Cotton T-Shirt, a trendy and fashionable choice for men and boys. This comfortable and breathable t-shirt is made from pure cotton, ensuring maximum comfort all day long. With its unique oversized fit and baggy style, it offers a relaxed and laid-back look that is perfect for casual wear. The round neck design adds a classic touch, making it suitable for various occasions. What sets this t-shirt apart is the eye-catching graphical frog print on the chest, adding a playful and fun element to your outfit. The Originals written on the chest print showcases the brand's originality and individuality. Available in swan white and mint green, these color options add elegance and vibrancy to your wardrobe. The swan white is perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions, while the mint green adds a refreshing pop of color to any outfit. Whether you prefer an oversized or baggy fit, this t-shirt has got you covered. Made from comfortable cotton, it ensures a soft and cozy feel. Introducing our bold and funky men's oversized t-shirt, perfect for your everyday street wear. This white colour t-shirt features a graphic print, adding a stylish touch to your ensemble. The half sleeves and crew neck provide a comfortable fit, allowing you to move freely throughout the day.

products.description: Biba, a leading Indian wear brand, was founded by Mrs. Meena Bindra in 1988. At the forefront of the Women's ethnic wear BIBA provides its customers with a wide range of traditional and contemporary clothing and accessories Our Logo, a peacock feather, denotes royalty, elegance, confidence and attention to detail Drawing from a rich legacy, leading market position and an industry defining online presence, BIBA is regarded as a 'category creator' in the women's Indian wear segment With a significantly diversified product portfolio that includes jewellery, footwear, handbags and perfumes, the brand has evolved to become the go-to destination for all things fashion Imbibing the Indian values in its designs and styles, BIBA strives to cater to the evolving and rich tastes of its customers.
